description: Create base HTML structure with header, workspace area, and about trigger
steps: Create index.html with semantic HTML5 structure
Add header with site title and about link
Create main workspace container for project cards
Link styles.css and app.css
Verify page loads with dot-grid background

description: Create app.css with homepage-specific styles (workspace, card layout)
steps: Define workspace container (full viewport, relative positioning)
Create .project-card base styles (position, border, padding)
Add card rotation via CSS custom property
Add hover states (border thickening, z-index boost)
Add grab/grabbing cursor states

description: Implement project card HTML structure with data attributes
steps: Create article.project-card template with date, title, description
Add data-url, data-x, data-y, data-rotation attributes
Add optional screenshot figure element
Add 3-5 sample project cards with varied positions/rotations
Verify cards render at specified positions

description: Implement card drag functionality with pointer events
steps: Create app.js with card initialization
Add pointerdown handler to capture card and offset
Add pointermove handler to update card position
Add pointerup handler to release card
Verify cards can be dragged smoothly
On page load, read positions from localStorage
Apply stored positions to cards (override data-x/y)
On drag end, save updated position to localStorage
Handle missing/corrupt localStorage gracefully
Verify positions persist across page reload

description: Implement card click to navigate to external URL
steps: Add click handler to cards
Distinguish click from drag (check movement distance)
Navigate to data-url on click (window.open for external)
Verify links work without interfering with drag

description: Create about modal HTML and CSS structure
steps: Add modal backdrop and modal box to HTML
Style modal with 2px border, paper background
Add title bar with about heading and close button
Add content area for about text and links
Hide modal by default with display:none or visibility
Add click handler to about trigger link
Show modal on trigger click
Close modal on close button click
Close modal on backdrop click
Close modal on Escape key press

description: Implement mobile layout (stacked cards, no drag)
steps: Add media query for max-width 768px
Convert workspace to vertical flex/grid layout
Disable position:absolute on cards for mobile
Remove rotation on mobile for cleaner list
Disable drag functionality on touch devices

description: Add keyboard navigation and accessibility attributes
steps: Add role and aria attributes to modal
Trap focus within open modal
Make cards focusable with tabindex
Add keyboard activation (Enter) for cards
Test with screen reader

description: Add reset button to restore default card positions
steps: Add small reset link/button in corner
On click, clear localStorage positions
Reapply original data-x/data-y positions
Optional: subtle visual feedback on reset
